add.title: Valid US/UK/Schengen Visa
add.description: Indian citizens with a valid US, UK, or Schengen visa (used at least once) are eligible for Instant E-Visa / Visa on Arrival.

modify.description: Recent color photo, white background. Women do not need to wear a headscarf in the photo unless they usually do.

steps_flow.title: Check Eligibility
steps_flow.description: If you have US/UK/Schengen visa, apply for 'Visa on Arrival' or 'Instant E-Visa'. Otherwise, apply for 'Stopover Visa' or regular sticker visa.

steps_flow.title: Apply Online (KSA Visa)
steps_flow.description: Visit the official KSA Visa platform (ksavisa.sa).

steps_flow.title: Pay Fees
steps_flow.description: Pay the visa fee and mandatory insurance fee.
